modName: Followers of Gol - The Five Housecarls and The Women of Whiterun
summary: This offers makeovers of many female NPCs in Skyrim. 15 so far, with 25+ to be added soon.
descriptionHtml:
[center][i]Goliatron presents...

[/i][font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=4][i]- Followers of Gol -[/i][/size][/b]
[size=6][b]The Five Housecarls
[/b][/size][i][size=3]- and - [/size][/i]
[size=6][b]The Women of Whiterun[/b][/size][/font][/center][center]
[size=3]I am proud to finally offer the first fifteen of [/size][b][i][size=4]40+ customized NPCs[/size][/i][/b][size=3] that I have tweaked and fiddled with for far too long.[/size]

[size=3]"The Five Housecarls" modifies the appearance of the five Housecarls from the major Skyrim cities: [/size][b][size=4]Lydia, Iona, Jordis the Sword-Maiden, Argis the Bulwark,[/size] [/b][size=3]and[/size][b] [size=4]Caldea[/size][/b][size=4] [/size][size=3](formerly Calder).[/size]

[size=3]"The Women of Whiterun" modifies the appearance of ten women from that beautiful city: [/size][size=4]Adrianne Avenicci, Aela the Huntress, Jenassa, Irileth, Njada, Olfina, Ria, Saadia, Uthgerd the Unbroken, [/size][size=3]and [/size][size=4]Ysolda[/size][size=3].[/size]

[size=3]Both sets allow the NPCs to auto-level with the player character, up to level 255.  They will use whatever skin textures you have installed for your player character, so your results may not be quite like the screenshots here.  I use my own custom mashup of skin textures that I do not have permission to release here.[/size]

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36913/?]MFVM - More Follower Voices Mod Plus Khajiit Marriage[/url]  by  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4825044]mysticentity[/url] is REQUIRED for Argis' voice to work properly.  Without it, she issues only an 'aye'.  I believe it must be loaded before this mod.[/size]

[i][size=4]These followers use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS Hairdos[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG F[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]emale Eyebrows[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]...  However, the mods are NOT REQUIRED.  All of the meshes and textures needed are packed with my mod.  That said, I highly recommend all of these mods.

[/size][/i][size=3][img]http://ft.trillian.im/3600f6287cffab5819f8913ac310f2e4e803e161/6u4SpgfxZ6kIS4Wex4NgfXQTG9u12.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=6]Iona[/size]
[i][size=4]Riften[/size][/i][/center]
[font=Trebuchet MS][center][i][size=4]
[/size][/i][img]http://ft.trillian.im/3600f6287cffab5819f8913ac310f2e4e803e161/6u4SqCHuWq6bAKFRm6hwoSUWf8Ut4.jpg[/img]
[size=6]Lydia
[/size][i][size=4]Whiterun[/size][/i]

[i][size=4]
[/size][/i][img]http://ft.trillian.im/3600f6287cffab5819f8913ac310f2e4e803e161/6u4SpNClNRt84mC1Kuyu1V9slfRAQ.jpg[/img]
[size=6]Jordis The Sword-Maiden[/size]
[i][size=4]Solitude


[/size][/i][img]http://ft.trillian.im/3600f6287cffab5819f8913ac310f2e4e803e161/6u4Sp0Edf9kK5mhcecuGts75I2F88.jpg[/img]
[size=6]Caldea
[/size][size=4][i](formerly Calder)[/i][/size]
[i][size=4]Windhelm[/size][/i][i][size=4]


[/size][/i][img]http://ft.trillian.im/3600f6287cffab5819f8913ac310f2e4e803e161/6u4Syf323YuJLHclkULP5oNcstH7K.jpg[/img]
[size=6]Argis the Bulwark[/size]
[i]Markarth



[size=3][u]Future "Followers of Gol" releases:[/u][/size]
[i][b]
[size=4]- Alva -[/size]
[size=4]- Grelka -[/size]
[i][i][b][size=4]- Eola -[/size]
[size=4]- Sapphire -[/size]
[size=4]- Tonilia -[/size]
[size=4]- Vex -[/size]
[size=4]- Mjoll the Lioness -[/size]
[size=4]- Maven Black-Briar -[/size]
[size=4]- Karliah -[/size]
[size=4]- Irgnir -[/size]
[size=4]- Karita -[/size]
[size=4]- Annekke Crag-Jumper -[/size]
[size=4]- Adelaisa Vendicci -[/size]
[size=4]- Astrid -[/size]
[size=4]- Gabriella -[/size]
[size=4]- Borgakh the Steel Heart -[/size]
[size=4]- Ugor -[/size]
[size=4]- Delphine -[/size]
[size=4]- Aranea Ienith -[/size]
[size=4]- Elisif  The Fair -[/size]
[size=4]- Elenwen -[/size]
[size=4]- Brelyna Maryon -[/size]
[size=4]- Faralda -[/size]

[size=5]Big thanks to 'Supertin' for creating this wonderful video![/size]

[youtube]syjIHRIVWG4[/youtube]
[/b][/i][/i][/b][/i][/i]

[size=4][i][u]Credits:[/u][/i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS Hairdos[/url] by Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos
(the author has pulled the file from the Nexus, but has left a download link)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG F[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]emale Eyebrows[/url] by Hello Santa

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot
[/size][/center][/font]
author: Goliatron

files.name: Followers of Gol - The Five Houscarls
files.fileName: Followers of Gol - The Five Houscarls-59943-0-3beta.rar
files.changelogHtml:
All followers now use vanilla weights. If you are experiencing a neck gap or overlap, try the batch files in the downloads section. Instructions are included.
Added update for a wrinkle-free Irileth.
